Class Mashup

java.lang.Object
  Mashup

public class Mashup
extends java.lang.Object

This class creates a mashup visualisation of the given data, using the summary table. The attributes to be plotted on X and Y-axes, and the attribute according to which the points are colorcoded can be chosen at runtime .

Constructor Summary
Mashup(prefuse.data.Table t, java.lang.String xfield, java.lang.String yfield)
           
Mashup(prefuse.data.Table t, java.lang.String xfield, java.lang.String yfield, java.lang.String sfield)
          This function creates a visualization , makes all the actions required for visualization It also displays the tooltip when user hovers over a node .

Mashup

public Mashup(prefuse.data.Table t,
              java.lang.String xfield,
              java.lang.String yfield,
              java.lang.String sfield)
This function creates a visualization , makes all the actions required for visualization It also displays the tooltip when user hovers over a node . Size and background colour of the jframe are also set in this method

Signature: void display(Table t) Creates a JFrame to display the scatter plot. It takes as input a sumary table t and displays it in a frame .
